data.name: Dimday Red
data.detailed_description:
Follow_us_on_Kickstarter_


We have pre-launched on Kickstarter! Join our mailing list to be among the first ones to be notified of a huge, super early-bird, 40% discount and to learn more about the world after the Lapse!


Join_the_Community, Play_the_ARG, Be_in_the_Game_


Join our community and become part of Dimday Red while you help us shape the world and its history!

Be a part of our Alternate Reality Game on Discord and our Mailing List and learn more about the world of Dimday Red, before the events of the game!

Fight for the poor or sell yourself out to the corporate elite! Embrace your Sins or stick to your Virtues. Solve riddles and figure out the truth about the Lapse!


Powered_by_the_Apocalypse_


Dimday Red is one of the first PC RPGs Powered by the Apocalypse! It's based on a brand-new TTRPG system, also made by us, coming soon on Kickstarter!

We are grateful to Meguey Baker and D. Vincent Baker for their impeccable work with Apocalypse World and setting the fundamentals for the entire Powered by the Apocalypse movement. Our work would not have been possible without them. Thank you!


About the Game

Dimday Red is an Interactive Fiction RPG where you play as Cillian, an assassin working for the Syndicates. Pick and combine Trait cards to shape your personality, choose who you are on the final days of Earth and roll the dice: if you’re lucky enough, you won’t burn before the world does.

The Fireball, formerly known as Earth, is gradually approaching the Sun. The closer it gets to it, the more disastrous the consequences for the planet and its inhabitants become.


Experience the City of Neu Bonn through the eyes of Cillian, a cold-blooded assassin working for the Syndicates, as he protects his partner, Meg, from the perils of this new world- at all costs!



Customize your character traits and work your way towards the 7 Deadly Sins and 7 Heavenly Virtues. Select between 42 Trait cards and combine them to build a unique personality for Cillian.



Build, strengthen or even ruin your relationships with other characters. Form meaningful connections, distance yourself from others or unleash your hatred upon your enemies.



Discover the impact of your choices and the influence of chance on them. Make conscious decisions but never underestimate how much the outcome can change with a roll of the dice. Every last one of your choices, but also luck, shape the narrative in new and interesting ways leading to multiple endings.



Fight for justice for all, for some, or for none. Destroy your enemies or protect your allies! Decide who you want to be until the world ends.


Weather the Heat and keep your cool while the world is being reduced to ashes. Manage your temperature levels and make sure you don’t burn way before the planet does!

data.short_description: An Interactive Fiction RPG where you play as Cillian, an assassin working for the Syndicates. Pick and combine Trait cards to shape your personality, choose how you live on the final days of Earth and roll the dice: if you’re lucky, you won’t burn before the world does.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti (3072 VRAM); Radeon HD 6850 (1024 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200); AMD FX-4350 (4 * 4200)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 2048 VRAM; Radeon RX 460 4096 VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS version 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or eGPU or a Metal supported GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS version 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or eGPU or a Metal supported GPU (Intel Iris and Intel HD 4000 or newer, AMD GCN-based GPUs newer, nVidia Kepler-based GPU’s or newer)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti (3072 VRAM); Radeon HD 6850 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200); AMD FX-4350 (4 * 4200)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 2048 VRAM; Radeon RX 460 4096 VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In Dimday Red there are a few risqué scenes of implied nudity, and implied sexual content. While none of it is explicit or adult only, it exists. There's no denying that sex plays a major role in this reality and the relationships we build with one another. Thus, omitting it from the game would lead to an inaccurate depiction of the end of the world.
